tasks.label: Populate Config
command:
cat <<EOF > /tmp/config.yaml.debug
schedulerName: slurm-bridge-scheduler
mcsLabel: kubernetes
slurmRestApi: http://localhost:6820
partition: slurm-bridge

tasks.label: Populate KubeSchedulerConfig
command:
cat <<EOF > /tmp/scheduler-config.yaml.debug
apiVersion: kubescheduler.config.k8s.io/v1
kind: KubeSchedulerConfiguration
clientConnection:
  kubeconfig: ${HOME}/.kube/config
leaderElection:
  leaderElect: false
  resourceNamespace: default
  resourceName: slurm-bridge-scheduler
profiles:
- schedulerName: slurm-bridge-scheduler
  plugins:
    queueSort:
      enabled:
      - name: 'PrioritySort'
    bind:
      enabled:
      - name: 'DefaultBinder'
    multiPoint:
      enabled:
      - name: SlurmBridge
      disabled:
      - name: '*'
  pluginConfig:
  - name: SlurmBridge

tasks.label: Fetch SLURM_JWT
command: export SLURM_JWT="$(kubectl --namespace=slinky get secrets slurm-bridge-token -o jsonpath="{.data.auth-token}" | base64 --decode)" &&
